data.name: MOTHERSHIP
data.detailed_description:
Mothership is a sci-fi exploration game with a dreamy atmosphere. You will play as a lost child who will travel across the real star systems of our own galaxy looking for other space refugees like you, to live in peace. During your search you will track the signals of huge crashed Motherships in order to recover their fuel and be able to continue searching deeper into space.




  • Pathfinding - Find your own way to the Motherships' Black-Boxes in exotic open worlds
  • Scout gear - Use your scout gear to access new ways : cut any object with your nano-machete, rappel with your rope from anywhere ...
  • Environment dangers - Spot and overcome the hidden environmental traps
  • Mothershipsâ€™ wrecks - Explore the spooky Mothership wrecks to recover their fuel
  • Rush return - Return to your ship while escaping from catastrophic events




  • Weightlessness - Feel the zero gravity like never before : drift like a real astronaut or fly like a rocket-man
  • Feel at home - Take a break and chill out in your shipâ€™s dreamy atmosphere
  • Playground - Enjoy listening aerial music, playing mini-games or just going outside for a spacewalk on the void
  • The Cupola - Contemplate the surface of the planets from high orbit in your shipâ€™s observatory




  • Exoplanets - Experience different gravities and light/night cycles on each exoplanet
  • Orbital search - Control your ship orbit trajectory in real time to perform atmospheric re-entry and orbital rendez-vous maneuvers
  • Star path - Travel to the most famous stars of the sky : Alpha Centauri, Sirius, Vega ...
  • Augmented reality - Perceive the planetsâ€™ movement thanks to your augmented-reality vision
  • Theory of relativity - A life-span adventure due to Einsteinâ€™s time dilation when travelling close to the speed of light

data.short_description: Mothership is a "space haiku", a dreamy science-fiction adventure. It is a pathfinding-sim where you will explore exotic and treacherous exoplanets to recover the cores of huge space wrecks.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Italian
